txt.en: Burned fungal mushrooms in the Wracking-hall ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

You have burned many of the mushrooms growing within the Wracking-hall. Although you cannot be certain that they were the same kind you discovered in the depths of Moria, you have done well to prevent them from taking hold in Minas Morgul.
You have burned many fungal mushrooms in the Wracking-hall.
Overrun by nameless creatures, the Wracking-hall of Minas Morgul bears the signs of a familiar blight.
The Wracking-hall can be found in the Circle of Death.\n\nYou have discovered a number of fungal mushrooms in the Wracking-hall and should burn them before the fungus can take hold of Minas Morgul.

Several, small mushrooms bearing a familiar blight have begun to grow in the shadows of the Wracking-hall.

If they are allowed to thrive, it is likely the same fungus that overtook the depths of Moria might soon spread throughout Minas Morgul.

You should burn the mushrooms and stop the spread of the blight in Minas Morgul.
Burn fungal mushrooms in the Wracking-hall ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
